column1: The forests... now the air is choked with its ash...
We cleared the forests for farmland... but the hunger won't go away
There was so much to be gained...
The animals kept withdrawing deeper, and the soil always turned to dust
Such an enormous creature the hunters brought back that day...
It was supposed to be the end of our hunger...
The parade... we looked on and our mouths watered...
The sight of that catch... the smell of burning wood... the emptiness of our stomachs...
The ash... the dust... it's blinding...
